item.title: Job Performance Scales: LDA Topic Modeling
item.description: /* this chunk of code centers all of the headings */ h1, h2, h3 { text-align: center; } Approach Once we gathered a corpus of scales from a variety of sources, we wanted to be able to analyze these scales cohesively. Latent Dirichlet Allocation (LDA) is a probabalistic topic modeling process which considers each document as a distribution of topics and each topic as a distribution of words.
